website_summaries.verdict: Easy to plug in almost anywhere and put to use.
pros: We love the briefcase design that transports better than products that require water
Beginners can follow the e-book for tutorials as well
cons: We wish it came with more client-friendly features

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I skeptical about purchasing this but I tried it yesterday and it heats up quickly and hold heat.. just have to watch that it’s not to hot to apply on skin... great purchase! Thinking about purchasing another one
customer_reviews.author: Cab

customer_reviews.title: Timer is only 90 min!
customer_reviews.text: Its ok. ! But i dont like it has a timer for ONLY 90 MIN. I do up to 130min massages. So no good. Very small also. There are better ones on the market.
customer_reviews.author: bobbie jo jennings

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed at all
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely did not like this product. Prior to this purchase I had to use the portable hot stone clamshell set and loved it. I tried this set and I did not like it. This box is heated by wires underneath a cloth sheet that you lay the rocks on. This results in spotty heat, making my stones different temperature some cooler than others. It does not heat up much. It is also extremely hard to clean because of any oil gets on the cloth that covers the heating element your basically out of luck
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: So glad we ordered this set
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad we ordered this set after struggling with the clam-shell type heaters. Our requirement for our therapists is a robust easy to use, good quality heater that holds up under continual use in our chain of salons. This one fits the bill and we have disposed of the cheaper type now. We could have saved ourselves a lot of bother if we had ordered these first
customer_reviews.author: dbh

customer_reviews.title: Nice to travel with
customer_reviews.text: Loving being able to use these at home. Been a cosmetologist since 1990. And these are perfect for home or travel to my friends that need some love of hot stones.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Wood

customer_reviews.title: Maybe next time have to check details specifically
customer_reviews.text: I was using this tools for hot stone massage but I don’t like it! It’s like a toy not for professional massage therapist. I brought another one hot stone from Amazon but the items was broken when it shipped. So I have to canceled it! Not recommended for this item!
customer_reviews.author: Rosdiandra gabel

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I really live the portable hot stone set. I am a licensed massage therapist. My last set i bought was cheaper but it gave out. The difference between this 1 and my other 1 is that this 1 is bigger and comes with more rocks. Also the cord is detachable and has different settings. My last 1 looked just like it, just smaller and the cord was attached. Thats actually why it went out. The cord shorted out from being bent when packed. I love that the cord comes out so now i dnt have to worry about that again. It also heats up very fast and efficient. I love it. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Hill

customer_reviews.title: Hot stonea
customer_reviews.text: Best investment I've ever made, easy to set up and heats nice!!! Only complaint is I wish they evenly distributed the heating elements, center gets hotter than sides !!
customer_reviews.author: shawna grayson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love the heated box so the stones stay nice and warm!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the carrying case to help keep everything organized. The stones are great!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Brock

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. The heat up was good and the stones maintained their heat long enough to carry out a treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Vlada

customer_reviews.title: Stones don’t get hot enough !
customer_reviews.text: Dislike - stones did not get near warm enough. Like - small and compact. Wish it would have worked out.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Arzie

customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful and has an effect but it takes a long time to heat up
customer_reviews.author: MARZWAQ ALDOSARI

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: It is ok product not the best one out there.For the price i think worth but the quality is ok i can give 3 star as a professional massage therapist.
customer_reviews.author: Gen

customer_reviews.title: Wife Loved
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my wife and she loves when I put them on her back
customer_reviews.author: SM of Indiana

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: The first time plugging in the heating case, resulted in the charging port being pushed into the case. Never had a single opportunity to enjoy this product. I would put the money straight into the trash before I wasted materials and gave this product another chance.
customer_reviews.author: KevinsMorrills

customer_reviews.title: heater will not stay on
customer_reviews.text: We have tried several times to get the stones heated and the heater will come on for no more than 5- 10 minutes then shuts off. If we can not figure it out, we will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Keri Hargrove

customer_reviews.title: Just enough stones
customer_reviews.text: Awesome carrying case isn’t hard to carry very light weight
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Bellantino 1

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: It seemed ok but then it just stopped working. Be careful buying this because its too pricey to purchase and have minimal use.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Massage stones
customer_reviews.text: Received my stones, was disappointed that one of them was already broke
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Hime

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product definitely helps sooth the muscles after a long busy day!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Lam

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I made my wife very happy when I started including these stones as part of her massage therapy. The metal case is a bit thin, but it does heat the stones in about 30 minutes, and they stay hot for some time. Note, the stones are quite hot - they are very uncomfortable if placed on the bare skin. I suggest placing a bed sheet between the hot stone and the skin. My only complaint is that the thin felt-like material on the inside of the case seems cheap; otherwise, the stone kit works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: David M

customer_reviews.title: The stones are good and I use them in the stone warmer
customer_reviews.text: The stones are good and I use them in the stone warmer...not this case...it fails to get really warm...sorry guys.
customer_reviews.author: Alexsanudra

customer_reviews.title: Happy Wife
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I found this set, it’s the perfect starter kit to get into stone massage. These stones seem to stay warm longer and warm up so much quicker than my friends clamshell set. When covered in oil they glide really well, and their shape makes it easy to hold in my hand as I give the massage. There's a guide to giving hot stone massages that is included which is really useful. I was thinking of getting a book, but this has been more than good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Frozen North

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: The stones do not stay warm for very long. Makes giving a massage awkward because of having to constantly warm stones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain, wonderful product.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product, smaller case than I thought. Stones are wonderful, could use a sacral stone though.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal  B

customer_reviews.title: Great set of stones
customer_reviews.text: Stones got nice and hot quickly and are a nice assortment of sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Lulumc

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It works great and my clients are happy, which makes me happy
customer_reviews.author: Gari Jenkins

product_meta.title: Portable Hot Massage Stone Heater Kit 16 Stones Warmer Set E-book
feature_bullets: AUTHENTIC BASALT VOLCANIC ROCKS – We know that heat retention is important to give you and your clients the best hot rock therapy experience -These stones are large enough to retain the heat for a long and relaxing massage - Heat from 15 to 40 minutes depending on intensity required

FREE E-BOOK - A succinct and informative course in thermotherapy describing all the techniques and movements needed for the best and most appropriate massage for your client - (see below for more details)

STYLISH – The silver and chrome case with a chrome carry handle will be the perfect addition to your beauty and relaxation accoutrements. Any salon or spa will be enhanced with this professional warmer set.
WEIGHT - Lightweight and Portable (total weight 5.5lb) - Easy to transport from client to client or just take round to a friend’s house
THE TEXTURE YOU NEED - Just the right smoothness for a perfect glide (not rough or too slippery)
